content:
But as a digital AI assistant, I don't have a physical living room or personal experiences. I exist solely to provide information and assist with inquiries. I don't have a personal space or possessions, including a TV or furniture.

However, I can continue to help you explore your own living room layout and provide suggestions based on your specific needs and preferences. Please feel free to share more about your current setup, such as the room's dimensions, the location of the TV, and how you currently sit to watch it. This will help me better understand your situation and provide more tailored advice.
